title: African footballer responds to being racially abused
text:
African footballer responds to being racially abused By Daniel Bevan (columnist) 08 Oct 2015 09:03:50 
reads 
comments 
Itâ€™s often a sad sight when racism in football over shadows the actual match, but this weekend a player responded brilliantly to fans abusing him. 
Last week Belgian side Genk played Kortrijk who racially abused defender Christian Kabasele who is a Tongan international. 
This week Genk faced Standard Liege and the 24 year old open the scoring after heading home a corner. 
In an effort to show up the fans who had made fun of him one week prior, Kabasele proceeded to celebrated by pretending to be a monkey. 
The match finished 3-1 to Genk but all the talk after the game was of Christian Kabasele and his reaction. Related Sport News
